thread.title: Alchemy IoT Hires Greg Walsh as Executive Vice President of Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: Alchemy IoT Hires Greg Walsh as Executive Vice President of Sales
text:
LAFAYETTE, Colo., Alchemy IoT ( https://alchemyiot.com ), a provider of AI-powered applications for industrial IoT, today announced the hiring of Greg Walsh as Executive Vice President of Sales. Walsh, a seasoned executive, will help drive the company's aggressive growth strategy and lead its sales organization. The company recently released its cloud-based SaaS application, Clarity ( https://alchemyiot.com/clarity/ ), which helps customers realize a faster and greater return on their industrial assets through a novel "no-code" approach to IoT Asset Intelligence.
"Greg has an impressive history of driving outcomes for industrial companies, and a breadth of industry knowledge that will allow him to provide excellent support to our customer base," said Victor Perez, CEO of Alchemy. "We believe his acumen and deep experience will expand the reach of our cloud-based SaaS solution into key verticals. Our goal is to help industrial businesses overcome the technical and cost prohibitive challenges associated with grandiose digital transformation efforts by empowering them to maximize asset ROI first. Greg will play the vital role of connecting our solution to customer value."
Walsh has more than 20 years' experience in leadership and growth-focused sales roles where he became deeply entrenched in the energy market. Through his industry experience, Walsh has become highly skilled at interfacing with U.S. government agencies, major utilities, oil and gas firms, and other industrial enterprises. Prior to Alchemy IoT, Walsh held leadership roles for companies including G.E., Alstom Power and ABB Power Generation.
"I am thrilled to be joining the hot, new start-up Alchemy IoT as a key member of its executive sales team," said Walsh. "The utility of the company's Clarity solution and its innovative approach to helping customers achieve business outcomes fast is a truly exciting proposition."
About Alchemy IoT
Alchemy IoT is an IoT Asset Intelligence company. It helps small- to mid-sized industrial customers tap the power of artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and IoT to transform business and discover new opportunities for growth. Its Clarity application is offered as a SaaS, delivering actionable intelligence, visualization and context into industrial asset performance and health. Alchemy believes the simplification of IoT, and advancements in AI, will fuel the adoption and the success customers expect.
